resources.string: This app needs some privileges to work. Click the button to grant them. You will need to select the app from the list and enable access to manage all files.
Select a source folder to move files from.
Select a destination folder to move files to.
When started, a background job will run approximately every 15 minutes that moves files from the source folder to the destination folder.

If you need more frequent moving, a permanent background service can be run. This will allow for real-time monitoring of the source folder. Note that the timed job should be left enabled in order to restore the running state of the system when rebooting or upgrading the package.
This shows the most recent part of the log file (scroll up for more)
